text: Artie Pitt (August 14, 1913 - February 1, 2002) was an American gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:2002 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:People from West New York, New Jersey
title: Artie Pitt
